name: Color Skillz - Match 3 Switch
description:
Match 3 meets Tetris! How good are you really?

The Ultimate Puzzle Experience : Kinda like 1010 but different

Fill the board, match 3 or more colors and clear for points!

-Compete head to head against players from around the world.

-Race against the clock. 3 minute rounds

-Play for fun or play for real cash (where available)

- A simple puzzle game that requires a deep strategy to master

Challenge people around the world with SKILLZ, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, cash or virtual currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing! SKILLZ: eSports for Everyone.

Visit us at www.eplaystudios.com for more info

For info regarding Skillz tournaments visit www.skillz.com
